infn.bed.item

Class FrontViewBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • cnuphys.bCNU.item.AItem
      • cnuphys.bCNU.item.PathBasedItem
        • cnuphys.bCNU.item.PolygonItem
          • cnuphys.bCNU.item.RectangleItem
            • infn.bed.item.FrontViewBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cnuphys.bCNU.attributes.IAttributeDisplayable, cnuphys.bCNU.drawable.IDrawable, cnuphys.bCNU.feedback.IFeedbackProvider, cnuphys.bCNU.visible.IVisible, java.util.EventListener

    public class FrontViewBar
extends cnuphys.bCNU.item.RectangleItem
    This class handles converting charge-time information to energy-time information. It then draws rectangles at the position of the hit and colors them. It displays energy-time information for each bar in the info panel. The front view provides a good visualization of the path of the detected particle.
    Author:
    Andy Beiter
